name: Cannibal Cafe
description:
Title says it all, become a sushi chef who makes sushi roles in a sushi shop...using human body parts as the main dish!
If you need to know the controls, check out the "How to play" section in the Main Menu.
Just a fun little time waster, have fun!
NOTE: Right mouse clicking may screw the swf version up...yep....
Recommend the downloadable version.
